title: Hala 1
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Middle Eastern, Turkish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pleasant small backstreet cafe with higher-than-average proportion of vegan options (e.g. stuffed peppers, vine leaves). Staff understand concept of vegetarianism and food allergies and are able to advise on ingredients in the various dishes.
